==German== ===Etymology=== From {{etyl|goh|de}} {{m|goh|tiuri}}, from {{etyl|gem-pro|de}} {{m|gem-pro|*diurijaz}}, akin to {{cog|osx|diuri}}, compare {{cog|nl|duur}}, {{cog|en|dear}}, {{cog|is|dýr}}, and {{cog|sv|dyr}}. ===Pronunciation=== * {{IPA|de|/tɔʏ̯ɐ/}} * {{audio|de|De-at-teuer.ogg|audio (Austria)}} * {{audio|de|De-teuer.ogg|Audio}} * {{rhymes|de|ɔɪ̯ɐ}} ===Adjective=== {{de-adj|teurer|teuersten}} # [[dear]] # [[expensive]] ====Declension==== {{de-decl-adj|teur|teurer|teuerst}} ====Antonyms==== * {{l|de|billig}} * {{l|de|preiswert}} * {{l|de|günstig}} ====Derived terms==== * {{l|de|Teuro}} ===Further reading=== * {{R:Duden}}
